Momocs

A complete toolkit for 2D morphometrics, from data extraction to multivariate analyses. Most common morphometrics approaches are included: outlines, curves, landmarks, "traditional" morphometrics, and facilities for data preparation, manipulation and visualization with a consistent grammar throughout. Momocs allows reproducible and complex morphometric analyses, other approaches to be plugged in or developped from those existing, and paves the way for a pure open-source workflow in R.

Details

To cite Momocs in publications: citation("Momocs").

  • Claude J. 2008. Morphometrics with R. Springer-Verlag, New-York.
